adverbs.description: unwastefully (comparative more unwastefully, superlative most unwastefully)

entries.meaning: Not wastefully, in a way that avoids waste.
examples: That all Copies of Bills, Answers, Depositions, or other Record, or thing whatsoever belonging to the Six Clerks to Copy, shall contain fifteen lines at the least in every sheet of paper, written fairly, and orderly, and unwastefully  […]
